title: Lenovo IdeaPad Duet 5 Chromebook sees first discount in today’s best deals, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by the first discount on the new Lenovo IdeaPad Duet 5 Chromebook with OLED screen. That’s alongside much of the same all-time low on DJI’s modular Action 2 camera and Samsung’s new PRO Plus microSD cards from $23. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch.

more…

The post Lenovo IdeaPad Duet 5 Chromebook sees first discount in today’s best deals, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The very first Lenovo IdeaPad Duet 5 Chromebook discount has arrived at $100 off with an OLED display in tow at $399. Plus more.
